bibl.title: A Greek Mathematical Tablet.
bibl.note: The best preserved of a set of six wooden tablets, VIth century. Recto: Arithmetical problems (= Pack2 2316). Verso: List of isopsephisms (= Pack2 2109). - Pp. 20-21: the author republishes P. Lond. V, 1718 (= Pack2 354), 71-78, problems in arithmetic from the archive of Dioscorus.
bibl.seg: 143.4 364 Dioscorus Aphroditensis Divinationem (ad) quae referuntur Mathematica
Skeat T.C., A Greek Mathematical Tablet.

The best preserved of a set of six wooden tablets, VIth century. Recto: Arithmetical problems (= Pack2 2316). Verso: List of isopsephisms (= Pack2 2109). - Pp. 20-21: the author republishes P. Lond. V, 1718 (= Pack2 354), 71-78, problems in arithmetic from the archive of Dioscorus.
C.R. par Marcel Hombert, ChrEg 12 (1937) No. 24, p. 284.
